needs.need: I need to be clearly informed of the possible outcomes and next steps when a judgment is declared, and that this does not necessarily mean I’ll be paid
needs.reason: so that I am clear on the process, have realistic expectations and know what further steps I might need to take

needs.need: I need the defendant to comply with the judgment
needs.reason: so that the onus is not on me to enforce it

needs.need: I want to know what my alternative options for dealing with the defendant are
needs.reason: so that I can attempt these before submitting my application to enforce the judgment

needs.need: I need consistent and correct information on enforcement types, including what outcomes I can expect
needs.reason: so that I can make an informed decision

needs.need: I need simple forms and clear, jargon-free information to guide me throughout the process
needs.reason: so that I am clear on the process, feel in control and am not overwhelmed

needs.need: I need to be able to view and submit my enforcement forms online
needs.reason: so that I do not have to attend court in person, which can be stressful and disruptive

needs.need: I want to know what fees I may be responsible for paying before applying for enforcement
needs.reason: so I don't get any unexpected surprises later on

needs.need: I need a secure way of seeing the status of my enforcement action
needs.reason: so that I know what is happening with my case

needs.need: I need regular updates and information from the court on timelines and the status of my case
needs.reason: so I know what to expect and don't have to keep chasing the court myself

needs.need: I want my enforcement action to be settled as soon as possible
needs.reason: so I can move on with my life

needs.need: I need reassurance that I will be treated fairly throughout the process
needs.reason: so that I am given the best chance to settle the case and an already stressful situation is not made worse

needs.need: I need the claimant and court to undertake all reasonable efforts to make me aware of the judgment before any enforcement action is commenced
needs.reason: so that I have a fair chance to respond and my situation doesn't escalate without my knowledge

needs.need: I need access to easily understood consistent information and support throughout the process
needs.reason: so that I can be clear on what I need to do and when

needs.need: I need time to think about how to respond to the judgment and consider how best to proceed
needs.reason: so that I don't feel the process is totally out of my control

needs.need: I need to know how to challenge the judgment and where I can go to get help
needs.reason: so that I have a right of reply and can defend myself if I feel the situation is unfair

needs.need: I need to know what my options for discussing the judgment are
needs.reason: so I can pick an option which is appropriate to me (e.g. mediation with third party, communicating with the claimant directly) and be more certain of a mutually acceptable outcome

needs.need: I need to know the details of the enforcement method against me
needs.reason: so I understand what may happen to me and what I need to do about it

needs.need: I need a secure way of seeing the status of my judgment debt - including the term, payments made and amount remaining if I have a payment plan in place
needs.reason: so that I can see how much I still owe and plan accordingly

needs.need: I need to know what impact the debt will have on my credit rating
needs.reason: so that my current debt problems don't cause longer-term issues for me

needs.need: I need to know what to expect from both types of bailiffs and what my rights are
needs.reason: so that I am not subject to intimidation

needs.need: I need my overall personal circumstances to be considered to ensure I’m protected from undue harm
needs.reason: so my situation doesn’t get worse

needs.need: I need to know how long the process is likely to take
needs.reason: so I can prepare myself and plan accordingly
